stories.fantasy_headline: Alchemists Brew Potent Duo for Ailing Livers
stories.fantasy_story: The Alchemists' Guild has discovered a powerful new healing elixir. By combining two well-known potions, they can now combat the scarring blight that afflicts many livers. This magical pairing drastically reduces mystical bindings and damage, offering hope where other remedies have failed.

stories.fantasy_headline: Grand Scribes Clarify: Quill-Work Suite Not Renamed!
stories.fantasy_story: Whispers have spread throughout the kingdom, claiming the Grand Scribes' Guild had rechristened their famed Quill-Work Suite. Many believed it was now called the Grand Magus Assistant. However, the Guild has clarified that while the Assistant is a new magical artifact, the Quill-Work Suite keeps its ancient name.

stories.fantasy_headline: New Folding Scrying Mirror Has No Seam!
stories.fantasy_story: At the Grand Inventors' Faire, the Display Crafters' Guild unveiled a marvel. They showcased an enchanted folding scrying mirror that opens without a single visible seam or line. This breakthrough could soon appear in the next generation of royal and noble folding scrying devices, making their magic even smoother.
